methods.name: zos_deployment_deploy
methods.description: deploys a deployment on a node

params.name: request
params.description: node id, and the deployment information

result.name: a string containing system hypervisor info

methods.name: zos_system_version
methods.description: returns the system version of the node request: node id

result.name: the system version of the node request: node id returns a SystemVersion object containig system version information

methods.name: zos_system_hypervisor
methods.description: returns system hypervisor info on the node

result.name: system hypervisor info on the node - request: node id returns a string containing system hypervisor info

methods.name: zos_system_dmi
methods.description: checks system DMI information

result.name: a DMI object containing dmi information for the specified node

methods.name: zos_network_public_config
methods.description: gets the public configuration of the specified node

result.name: a PublicConfig object containing the public configuration information of the specified node

methods.name: zos_network_interfaces
methods.description: returns all physical devices on a node

result.name: all physical devices on a node - request: node id returns a map from interface name to its ips

methods.name: zos_network_list_wg_ports
methods.description: returns a list of all taken ports on the node.

result.name: a list of all taken ports on the node

methods.name: zos_node_statistics
methods.description: returns some node statistics including total and available cpu, memory, storage, etc...

result.name: some node statistics including total and available cpu

methods.name: zos_deployment_changes
methods.description: returns all workload changes over the lifetime of the deployment

params.name: request
params.description: node id, and deployment contract id

result.name: all workload changes over the lifetime of the deployment - request: node id
result.description: and deployment contract id returns a list of Workload objects containing the workloads' states over the lifetime of the deployment

result.name: returns

WorkloadData
Result

farm_id.description: will try to use farmerbot if found on this farm.

dedicated.description: if the node is dedicated or not.

mru.description: free memory on node in MB.

hru.description: free hdd storage on node in GB.

sru.description: free ssd storage on node in GB.

Credentials.title: Credentials
Credentials.description: the needed configurations for twin login

GatewayFQDN.title: GatewayFQDN
GatewayFQDN.description: NOTE: is there any need to translate json here?

disk_size.description: in MBs in GB, monted in /mydisk

MachinesGet.title: MachinesGet
MachinesGet.description: struct AddMachine { machine Machine project_name string } struct RemoveMachine { machine_name string project_name string }

Node.title: Node
Node.description: NOTE: no need for this one

entrypoint.description: Mounts configure mounts/disks attachments to this machine

env.description: entrypoint of the container, if not set the configured one from the flist is going to be used

corex.description: Env variables available for a container

ZMachineResult.title: ZMachineResult
ZMachineResult.description: ZMachineResult result returned by VM reservation

Zlogs.title: Zlogs
Zlogs.description: Zlogs is a workload that enables users to stream logs from a zmachine to some url

output.description: zmachine name to stream logs for

mode.description: size of the zdb in GB

namespace.description: TODO: change json representation snake case after resolving #1952 in zos

port.description: Computed IPs of the ZDB. Two IPs are returned: a public IPv6, and a YggIP, in this order

NetworkWorkload.title: NetworkWorkload
NetworkWorkload.description: NetworkWorkload contains the network workload reservation arguments

wg_private_key.description: IPV4 subnet for this network resource, this must be a valid subnet of the entire network ip range.

wg_listen_port.description: The private wg key of this node (this peer) which is installing this network workload right now.

v6.description: V4 use one of the reserved Ipv4 from your contract. The Ipv4 itself costs money + the network traffic

PublicIPResult.title: PublicIPResult
PublicIPResult.description: PublicIPResult result returned by publicIP reservation

backends.description: whether to pass tls traffic or not

network.description: Backends are list of backend ips (only one is supported atm)

backends.description: whether to pass tls traffic or not

fqdn.description: Backends are list of backend ips (only one is supported atm)

ZOSNodeRequest.title: ZOSNodeRequest
ZOSNodeRequest.description: a request that contains zos node calls information

Deployment.title: Deployment
Deployment.description: Deployment is a ZOS deployment structure

expiration.description: description is human readable description of the deployment

SignatureRequirement.title: SignatureRequirement
SignatureRequirement.description: SignatureRequirement struct describes the signatures that are needed to be valid for the node to accept the deployment

SignatureRequest.title: SignatureRequest
SignatureRequest.description: SignatureRequest describes which twin should sign the deployment and how much this signature weighs

weight.description: true if this twin is required to sign the deployment

workload_type.description: workload name, must be unique per deployment

description.description: metadata is user specific meta attached to deployment

Result.title: Result
Result.description: Result is the struct filled by the node after a reservation object has been processed

state.description: Time when the result is sent

DMI.title: DMI
DMI.description: contains DMI information of the node

PublicConfig.title: PublicConfig
PublicConfig.description: PublicConfig is the configuration of the interface that is connected to the public internet

ipv4.description: Type define if we need to use the Vlan field or the MacVlan

Statistics.title: Statistics
Statistics.description: Statistics contains some info about the node like total and used resources

TFGridClient.title: TFGridClient
TFGridClient.description: TFGridClient is a client containig an RpcWsClient instance, and implements all tfgrid functionality
